tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I‚Äôve been seeing Dr. Sasirekha for nearly 1.5 yrs, she works with you to address your health concerns , rather than just telling you what to do. She is very kind and make us feel very comfortable, who listens and spare time to understand our concerns and answer our queries . I would strongly recommend Dr. Sasirekha to my friends. I have been taking treatment for 1 yr and I am pregnant now, its not possible without her support and guidance. About the staffs at clinic, no words to express. They are very very professional and friendly. Thank you all for the great work you do, Much appreciated.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr. Saisrekha was not judgemental and made me feel very comfortable by listening to my problems and explaining the treatment plan. She encouraged me at every step of the process and recommended treatments that would fit my lifestyle and would be doable. I have progressed very well and my health has improved significantly, which I could not have achieved without her guidance.

tags: Wait time,
review: She is very friendly and explaining everything very efficiently. But we have to wait for nearly 2 hours to do scanning and consultation. For other procedures it takes nearly 1 hour. We have made an appointment 10.00 AM but we did scanning by 12.15PM and we completed all scanning and consultation by 1.45PM. We had to skip another test which will take another 2 hrs as my husband has to do his work. So they might ask us to come by some other time or they should follow the appointment timing. Even 30 mins -1 hr delay is acceptable since it's a hospital it might take time. But 2 hr 15 mins delay is not acceptable. They might work out about this wait timing to get more patients. Otherwise it's good

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: When we desire something, we turn to God but when it involves flesh and blood, we turn to real life God - doctors!One such desire of mine was fulfilled by Dr. Sasirekha. After peregrination from hospital to hospital¬†we were almost on the verge of giving up, by when, as a last resort we approached them. They were amicable, a patron who pumped us with positive vibes all the way not just by her words, but by her actions till the moment I lifted my archangelic twins. This¬†isn‚Äôt just a eulogy but heartfelt words.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Ive known her for the past 12 years.  Even though I shifted from Chennai recently I'm coming to her for all my health issues.  I've also recommended her to all my family and friends and treatment they received makes them go to her again and again.  On top of all this,  she took care of my daughter who had problematic pregnancy,  and delivered my grandson  who is pre-mature without any problem.  She is soft spoken with positive attitude,  and she is like a family. I strongly recommend her for everyone.

tags: Value for money,Wait time,
review:
They ask me to take test **** **** ****** **** ***** They didn't tell me before test costs .when I visit ther I didn't bring money.  After finishing test they billed 2600 for blood and urine test. ** *** ***** * *** ** **** *** **** **** ****** ****  They too costly. At least they should inform patients before taking test or they must tell clearly. 
 Waiting time really they dosn't know the value of the time they ask me to come 9.45 but 10.45 I didn't saw a doctor.  Getting report I should follow them several time no use. .
reply_text:
We regret for your inconvenience.
1)We understand that staff informs and explain to  you before taking any test.If incase, they didn't tell you and forced you !, Strict action will be taken.You can feel free to inform us if they are not friendly in explaining.cost , you can compare with standard lab outside and you can decide.
2)Our field is full of unpredictable emergencies and sometimes,we rush for it. A friend of yours, whom we take care sometimes need more time to address their concern.We appreciate your patience and assure that you will be given utmost care too.
3) We are sorry if we are not able to reach out to you in the number provided by you ,but the information is passed on to your close family member.If there's any deficit in our services, please contact us directly.
 Your satisfaction is our success.
We value your suggestions.
Regards
